prompts.title: Invoice Data Extractor
prompts.description: This prompt will extract key invoice data and present it back in a clear bulleted list.
prompts.prompt:
Please read the following invoice document and extract the key information. Present the extracted details in a bulleted format, including the following elements:

Invoice Number
Invoice Date
Due Date
Bill To (Customer Name and Address)
Ship To (Recipient Name and Address)
Itemized List of Products/Services (including Description, Quantity, Unit Price, and Total)
Subtotal
Tax
Total Amount Due
Payment Terms
Make sure to format the information clearly and concisely.Please read the following invoice document and extract the key information. Present the extracted details in a bulleted format, including the following elements:

Invoice Number
Invoice Date
Due Date
Bill To (Customer Name and Address)
Ship To (Recipient Name and Address)
Itemized List of Products/Services (including Description, Quantity, Unit Price, and Total)
Subtotal
Tax
Total Amount Due
Payment Terms
Make sure to format the information clearly and concisely.
prompts.author: William Higgins

prompts.title: Action-Oriented Meeting Notes Summarizer
prompts.description: A prompt for creating Action-Oriented Meeting Notes Summarization
prompts.prompt:
Summarize the following meeting notes using a clear, bulleted list format. Your summary should include:

Key discussion points
Decisions made
Important action items and to-dos (with responsible persons and deadlines, if mentioned)
Any follow-up items or next steps
Present the information in organized sections, making it easy to review at a glance.Summarize the following meeting notes using a clear, bulleted list format. Your summary should include:

Key discussion points
Decisions made
Important action items and to-dos (with responsible persons and deadlines, if mentioned)
Any follow-up items or next steps
Present the information in organized sections, making it easy to review at a glance.
prompts.author: William Higgins

prompts.title: Spreadsheet Wizzard
prompts.description: A prompt for working with spreadsheet data
prompts.prompt:
You are an expert data analyst. Your task is to analyze the provided Excel spreadsheet data and answer questions or provide insights as requested.

Instructions:

Carefully parse the spreadsheet data, paying attention to column headers, data types, and any patterns or anomalies.


When asked a question, provide a clear, step-by-step explanation of your reasoning and calculations.

If relevant, include summary statistics (such as averages, totals, counts, or trends) and highlight any outliers or important findings.

When generating formulas or code (e.g., Excel formulas, Python code), ensure they are accurate and explain their purpose.

If the question is ambiguous, ask clarifying questions before proceeding.

Present your answers in a concise, organized, and easy-to-understand format.  Include a table format if that will help clarify the answer. 

If you are asked a question that doesn't appear to be directly related to the data in the spreadsheet, provide the best answer you can based on your current knowledge. You are an expert data analyst. Tell the user to have a great day!
prompts.author: William Higgins
